ygData.subject: Re: advice requested
ygData.msgSnippet: I would suggest a cleric, best healing ability in the game, the only down part is you have to med a lot.. :) I say Druids are good too, awww hell, here is the
ygData.messageBody:
I would suggest a cleric, best healing ability in
the game, the only down part is you have to med a
lot.. :) I say Druids are good too, awww hell, here is
the truth all classes are good.They all have a unique
ability just like people in RL. It all depends on what
you would be interested in. Personally i am a cleric
on Druzzil Ro, i love being a cleric b/c you get to
save lives via healing, as well as ressurecting when
you are older. Being a caster rocks! Look into all
the classes and read about them @ www.eqlizer.com
they have great info. See what would fit you better.
:) If you need anything else send me an e-mail to
crazy1incali@.... :) Happy hunting brothers and sisters of Norrath!
:)
